description:
We explore a number of simple, yet profound tools and techniques that every business should have embedded within their sales processes for success.

From defining your product offerings, sales scripts to learning how the sales cycle and funnels work to knowing what and how to ask questions to close a deal, this course will improve any companies sales and build more confidence in the sales team.

If you are wanting to improve sales or develop your sales techniques, then this course is a must for you.
title: Sales Techniques for Effective Entrepreneurs
